It is loosely based on a military uprising in the 1970s.","poster_path":"/jwE6cVIoJ4JP397yMGfBBpHMJmF.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ko","genre_ids":[28,18],"popularity":11.234,"release_date":"2003-12-24","video":false,"vote_average":7.103,"vote_count":112},{"backdrop_path":"/6g8iPZcDp7Q4aNUAiKIKLkaR5MQ.jpg","id":36928,"title":"H","original_title":"에이치","overview":"A notorious serial killer is finally arrested. The pressure is on the police to capture the culprits responsible. Scouring the school hallways in search of clues, undercover female detective Maggie Rawdon (Jessica Sonnerborn) enters Belmont High as a transfer student in an attempt to solve the hideous disappearance of the students. Maggie makes a few new friends, and gets invited to a private rave in the country. Just as the group begins to suspect that they've taken a wrong turn, however, the trap is sprung and Maggie finds out firsthand what fate has befallen the missing girls.","poster_path":"/ipl6NdM0LwyakzLH9gKBDn8YhmZ.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[28,18,80],"popularity":2.28,"release_date":"2010-11-16","video":false,"vote_average":7.174,"vote_count":23},{"backdrop_path":"/ksZTspehDCC4PCZN8ci31pFT6yp.jpg","id":660360,"title":"Noryang: Deadly Sea","original_title":"노량: 죽음의 바다","overview":"The Imjin War reaches its seventh year in December of 1598. Admiral Yi Sun-shin learns that the Wa invaders in Joseon are preparing for a swift withdrawal following the deathbed orders of their leader Toyotomi Hideyoshi. Determined to destroy the enemy once and for all, Admiral Yi leads an allied fleet of Joseon and Ming ships to mount a blockade and annihilate the Wa army. However, once Ming commander Chen Lin is bribed into lifting the blockade, Wa lord Shimazu Yoshihiro and his Satsuma army sail to the Wa army’s rescue at Noryang Strait.","poster_path":"/wFAe7gA513Pi2meI4ECwf6YEKR1.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ko","genre_ids":[28,36,18,10752],"popularity":214.283,"release_date":"2023-12-20","video":false,"vote_average":6.256,"vote_count":129},{"backdrop_path":null,"id":747761,"title":"Film","original_title":"Film","overview":"\"This piece, with the generic title Film, is a series of short videos built around one protocol: a snippet of news from a newspaper of the day, is rolled up and then placed on a black-inked surface. On making contact with the liquid, the roll opens and of Its own accord frees itself of the gesture that fashioned it. As it comes alive in this way, the sliver of paper reveals Its hitherto unexposed content; this unpredictable kinematics is evidence of the constant impermanence of news. As well as exploring a certain archaeology of cinema, the mechanism references the passage of time: the ink, whether it is poured or printed, is the ink of ongoing human history.\" –Ismaïl Bahri","poster_path":null,"media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[],"popularity":2.607,"release_date":"2012-10-01","video":false,"vote_average":7.313,"vote_count":8},{"backdrop_path":null,"id":611974,"title":"Retando A La Muerte","original_title":"Retando A La Muerte","overview":"","poster_path":"/xJPg9Ch5rJ9p0UWRz2mKzsq00RW.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"es","genre_ids":[],"popularity":3.622,"release_date":"1993-01-01","video":false,"vote_average":5.4,"vote_count":52},{"backdrop_path":null,"id":367085,"title":"Sad?","original_title":"Sad?","overview":"Set in the mid sixties and shot with more black than white, ‘SAD?’ is a dark ten minute film that explores the time that we spend alone watching television, and the good and sad effects it can have on you. The film has a timeless, forgotten feel about it, a study of a world and time detached from the norm, a life filled with both laughter and loneliness, escapism and escapees...","poster_path":null,"media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[99],"popularity":4.117,"release_date":"1996-01-18","video":false,"vote_average":6.315,"vote_count":27},{"backdrop_path":null,"id":79582,"title":"Aliens vs Avatars","original_title":"Aliens vs Avatars","overview":"Six college friends blowing off steam on a camping trip, find themselves caught up in a cat and mouse hunt with an Alien monster.
